DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine biologic activity Lolium perenne allergen extract histamine equivalent prick ( HEP ) unit , order use in-house reference preparation ( IHRP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Biological Standardization Lolium Perenne Allergen Extract
DOC.detailed_description: Four concentration Lolium perenne allergen extract , together positive negative control , use 10 mg/ml histamine dihydrochloride solution glycerinated phenol saline solution , respectively , test every patient duplicate volar surface forearm .
DOC.criteria: Subject provide write informed consent , appropriately sign date subject ( legal representative , applicable ) . Subject male female race ethnic group . Age > 18 year < 50 year study inclusion day . Positive skin prick test standardize commercially available preparation Lolium perenne allergen extract . The skin prick test consider positive test result wheal major diameter least 3 mm least size positive control . Positive skin prick test result valid perform within one year prior inclusion subject study A positive test specific IgE Lolium perenne ( CAPRAST ≥ 2 ) . IgE result valid perform within one year prior inclusion subject study . Allergic symptoms pollen season Lolium perenne . Mean forearm major diameter wheal provoke histamine dihydrochloride ( 10 mg/ml ) ≥ 3 mm . Immunotherapy past 5 year allergen preparation know interfere allergen test ( e.g. , grass group extract ) . Use drug may interfere skin reaction ( e.g. , antihistamine ) . See Appendix 1 Treatment follow medication : tricyclic tetracyclic antidepressant , βblockers corticosteroid ( > 10 mg/day prednisone equivalent ) . Pregnancy . Dermographism affect skin area test site either study visit . Atopic dermatitis affect skin area test site either study visit . Urticaria affect skin area test site either study visit . Participation another clinical trial within last month .
